description.en: The GEEKOM Mini IT12 Mini PC is a compact yet powerful computing solution featuring 12th Gen Intel® Core™ processors (i9-12900HK, i7-1280P, or i5-12450H). Designed for versatility, it supports up to 64GB DDR4 3200MHz dual-channel RAM and offers expandable storage with a PCIe 4.0 x4 M.2 SSD (up to 2TB), a SATA SSD slot, and a 2.5-inch HDD bay for a total capacity of up to 5TB. Equipped with Intel® Iris® Xe or UHD graphics, it supports quad displays via dual HDMI 2.0 and USB4 ports. Connectivity options include WiFi 6E, Bluetooth 5.2, 2.5G Ethernet, and multiple USB ports. Preinstalled with Windows 11 Pro, its compact design (117x112x45.6mm) and efficient cooling make it ideal for both professional and multimedia use.
description.es: El GEEKOM Mini IT12 es un mini PC compacto y potente con procesadores Intel® Core™ de 12ª generación (i9-12900HK, i7-1280P o i5-12450H). Ofrece hasta 64GB de RAM DDR4 3200MHz en doble canal y almacenamiento ampliable con SSD M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4 (hasta 2TB), una ranura SATA SSD y bahía para HDD de 2.5 pulgadas, alcanzando 5TB. Con gráficos Intel® Iris® Xe o UHD, soporta 4 pantallas mediante 2 HDMI 2.0 y puertos USB4. Incluye WiFi 6E, Bluetooth 5.2, Ethernet 2.5G y múltiples puertos USB. Preinstalado con Windows 11 Pro, su diseño compacto (117x112x45.6mm) y refrigeración eficiente lo hacen ideal para uso profesional y multimedia.
